title: UFC on ESPN 6 weigh-ins faceoff video highlights, photo gallery
text:
BOSTON – UFC on ESPN 6 ceremonial fighter weigh-ins took place Thursday, and MMA Junkie was on the scene at the Orpheum Theatre.

In the main event, former middleweight champion Chris Weidman makes his light heavyweight debut against undefeated contender Dominick Reyes. In the co-main event, Yair Rodriguez meets Jeremy Stephens in a featherweight bout with bad blood after the debacle that was their 15-second no contest last month at UFC Mexico City.

In addition, former NFL All-Pro Greg Hardy returns for his fourth UFC fight, when he takes on Ben Sosoli. Longtime veteran Joe Lauzon and rising prospect Maycee Barber also are featured on the main card.

You can watch the full slate of faceoffs in the video above. You can also check out our gallery below.

Gallery Photos: UFC on ESPN 6 ceremonial weigh-ins view 39 images

UFC on ESPN 6 takes place Friday at TD Garden and airs entirely on ESPN2.
